response.overview: On the main card of "SANKYO presents LIFETIME BOXING FIGHTS 30", Ichisho Ioka (Shisei), the world's four-weight champion, will face Michael Aldosgoiti (Venezuela) in the WBA World Bantamweight Challenger Decision Match. In the semifinals, Daiya Kira (Shisei), who placed second in the WBA world light flyweight, will face Ivan Garcia Valderras (Mexico), who is ranked 7th in the same class, as the WBA World Light Flyweight Challenger decider decider. All eight matches, including undercards, will be delivered exclusively live on Lemino Premium. On New Year's Eve in 2025, "Lemino Premium" will be held, and please support the new challenge of four-weight champion Kazuhiro Ioka.
response.title: LIFETIME BOXING FIGHTS 30
